overview: Bill chops onions to prepare a meal for his guest. He takes a portrait over the table. He sets the table for two and look at the mirror when he hears the bell. He opens the door: it is Michael. Bill opens a wine bottle and both eat dinner together. He holds Michael's hand. After the dinner, the couple dance. Suddenly, someone enters the house, it's Bill's wife accompanied by her lover.
title: The Date
